name: Kalend 2
description:
Game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare's 48th Game Jam.

Summary:

His dad became a living legend, and now he needs to surpass him. But the truth he finds may not be the one he wanted.

Kalend 2 is a RogueLike game focused on Spellcasting and diving deeper and deeper into an unexplored dungeon. How far can you get?

Controls:

W/A/S/D  to Move.

Left Mouse Button to use Normal Spell.

Right Mouse Button to use Ultimate Spell.

F to interact.

P to Pause.

Credits:

Programmer / Story: Gabriel Luís Duarte Pittol 

Art / Game Design: Pedro Augusto Ruppenthal 

Songs Used: Runescape - Song of the Elves | Magicka - Arrival at Hávindr | Star Ocean 3 - Mission To The Deep Space | Sen no Kiseki - Don't be Defeated by a Friend | MapleStory 2 - Ellinia Field 2  | Ys VIII - Sunshine Coastline | Fate Grand Order - Outbreak

Release Notes:

V1.01:

- Fixed a bug where players may be incorrectly hit by some enemies even when not hit by any attack.

- Fixed a bug where players may not be able to hit the first boss as frequent as it should (the core boss mechanic where it can only be hit during specific time frames remains unchanged)

- Fixed a bug where some audio files were playing abnormally loud

- Fixed a bug where a save data variable was being lost on the WebGL build.

- Base game version is still available for download
